review: It may work, but it didn't for me, in may case asked me to do some special setting on my router, which I did and still didn't work.
author: Luis Beato

review: I loved it, this is making my BlueRay useless hahaha!!! Also my BlueRay disc's are kind of becoming useless too with this item... I have almost all my movies stored in that new vudu thing and don't even need my TV's remote, I do everything through my phone: turn on the TV, change channel(phone app function) and with Chromecast I watch all my movies thruogh the phone and enjoy a better video phone call with relatives far away.
author: Javier Alatorre

review: 1/2 Star!!! Did not work in my systems and there were NO notations in the product write-up as to what configuration of system was required for it to work!!!VERY. VERY DISSAPPOINTED..................
author: On-Line Buyer

review: I'm actually very disappointed with this product. I downloaded Chrome and anytime I try to stream to my TV I get choppy connection and audio/video sync issues. I was using airplay and thought if I switched this would be better but it is by far inferior. I don't even use it... What a waste of money. Buyer beware.
author: Landon Clark

review: All I can say is awesome.  We use this everyday, and the picture is crystal clear!
author: Ellen
